com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.expressions

Class Expression.FormatOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.expressions.Expression.FormatOption
  • Enclosing class:
    Expression

    public static class Expression.FormatOption
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds format options used in a Expression.formatEntry(Expression, FormatOption...) that builds a Expression.format(FormatEntry...) expression.

    If an option is not set, it defaults to the base value defined for the symbol.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      • formatFontScale

        @NonNull
public static Expression.FormatOption formatFontScale(@NonNull
                                                               Expression expression)
        If set, the font-scale argument specifies a scaling factor relative to the text-size specified in the root layout properties.

        "font-scale" is required to be of a resulting type number.

        Parameters:
        expression - expression
        Returns:
        format option

      • formatTextFont

        @NonNull
public static Expression.FormatOption formatTextFont(@NonNull
                                                              Expression expression)
        If set, the text-font argument overrides the font specified by the root layout properties.

        "text-font" is required to be a literal array.

        The requested font stack has to be a part of the used style. For more information see the documentation.

        Parameters:
        expression - expression
        Returns:
        format option

      • formatTextFont

        @NonNull
public static Expression.FormatOption formatTextFont(@NonNull
                                                              java.lang.String[] fontStack)
        If set, the text-font argument overrides the font specified by the root layout properties.

        "text-font" is required to be a literal array.

        The requested font stack has to be a part of the used style. For more information see the documentation.

        Parameters:
        fontStack - value
        Returns:
        format option
